metadata.description: Enabled Auto Shutdown.  !!!If Enabled, AutoShutdownEmail MUST be added!!!!
The name of the Administrator of the new VM and Domain
The password for the Administrator account of the new VM and Domain
The SSH Public Key for the Administrator account on Linux VM
Sub DNS Domain Name Example:  sub1. must include a DOT AT END
Sub DNS Domain Name Example:  DC=sub2,DC=sub1, must include COMMA AT END
WK OS Version Number (Example:  Windows-11=22000.675.220507, Windows-10=19044.1706.220505)
The location of resources, such as templates and DSC modules, that the template depends on
Auto-generated token to access _artifactsLocation. Leave it blank unless you need to provide your own value.
